channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Bond king’ Jeffrey Gundlach predicts our next financial hangover — and it’s sobering
item.description: Easy money was never meant to last forever. Expect a 4% return on cash, 5% on bonds and 6% from stocks.

item.title: ‘She’s kept him afloat’: I’m 78 and leaving my daughter, 41, my life savings, but her partner is a mooch. How can I protect her?
item.description: “He keeps losing jobs and going on unemployment.”

item.title: Hasbro’s stock rallies as toy maker ups its revenue forecast for ‘Wizards of the Coast’
item.description: The toy company’s first-quarter results wowed Wall Street, but its outlook excluded any impact of tariffs due to uncertainty over trade negotiations.

item.title: Comcast admits it is ‘not winning’ in fight to stanch broadband subscriber losses
item.description: Comcast has been struggling with falling broadband and cable subscriptions amid a broader industry decline.

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders crash GameStop after shoppers report similar bugs at Target, Best Buy and Walmart. Most retailers are out of stock.
item.description: Nintendo Switch 2 preorders went live on Thursday, and gamers are reporting all sorts of issues with the buying process.

item.title: Impinj Inc. (PI) Soars 14.23% as Strong IC Market Share and Strategic Growth Plans Impress Investors
item.description: As of this writing, Impinj Inc. (NASDAQ: PI), a leading provider of RAIN RFID solutions, has seen its stock price surge by an impressive 14.23%, makin...

item.title: Wall Street is in love with this safe haven, dividend play and sees big returns this year
item.description: Strong first-quarter results from this telecommunications company have analysts confident it can navigate an uncertain macroeconomic environment.

item.title: Hasbro Soars 13.26%: What’s Behind the Surge?
item.description: As of this writing, Hasbro (HAS) shares have gained $6.99 per share or 13.26%, with a current price of $59.68. The toy maker has been making headlines...

item.title: 2 major Wall Street banks love this autonomous driving stock that can withstand trade war
item.description: "We see the tariff risk as manageable and non-US market demand remains strong," Goldman analyst Tina Hou wrote Thursday.

item.title: Bank of America cuts Apple price target on tariff hit, delayed AI rollout
item.description: Apple has also delayed the rollout of Apple Intelligence, its take on AI, several times since 2024.

item.title: Here’s the portfolio allocation that’s held up amid market volatility
item.description: Morningstar found diversified portfolios are beating all-stock and basic 60/40 strategies. Here's how it breaks the allocations down.

item.title: Analysts are hiking their price targets on this software stock after a blowout earnings report
item.description: Shares added about 8% before the market open on Thursday.

item.title: Healthcare Services Group Inc. (HCSG) Surges 20% on Strong Q1 Earnings and Revenue Growth
item.description: As the healthcare industry continues to navigate a complex landscape, one company that’s making waves is Healthcare Services Group Inc. (NASDAQ:HCSG)....

item.title: Pony AI Inc. Unveils Seventh-Generation Robotaxi Lineup, But Can the Stock Keep Up with Its Ambitious Plans?
item.description: As of this writing, Pony AI Inc.’s (Nasdaq: PONY) stock price has surged 29.57% to $5.39 per share, making it one of the biggest gainers in the market...

item.title: Could Trump’s Sovereign Wealth Fund Spark a Stock Market Surge? A Guide for Retail Traders
item.description: On February 3, 2025, President Donald Trump signed an executive order that could reshape the U.S. economy—and potentially your stock portfolio. The or...
